title: Masala Dosa
description: A crispy South Indian rice crepe filled with a spiced potato mixture.
instructions: Heat oil in a wide pan and add mustard seeds. When they begin to splutter, add curry leaves and green chilies.
Add sliced onions and sauté until translucent and soft.
Crumble the boiled potatoes and add them to the pan along with turmeric and salt.
Mix everything well and cook for 5 minutes until the flavors blend, then set the potato filling aside.
Heat a flat pan or tawa on medium heat. Pour a ladle of dosa batter and spread it thinly in a circular motion.
Drizzle a few drops of oil around the edges and cook until the dosa becomes golden and crisp.
Place a spoonful of potato filling in the center, fold the dosa, and serve hot.
